glosses: bunch, cluster, clump, a group of similar things, such as grapes
corymb, fascicle, a cluster of flowers or leaves on a plant
wisteria, any of several woody, climbing vines of the genus Wisteria

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish صالقم (salkım, “bunch, cluster”), from Proto-Turkic *salkım (“bunch of grapes”) and probably related to sarkmak (“to hang loosely”).
